forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers this morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers for the afternoon hours. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. High around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
